slime.activation_text: You have been covered in nasty <s>slime</s>.
slime.deactivation_text: You are no longer covered in slime.

blind.activation_text: You have <s>lost your sense of vision</s>.
blind.deactivation_text: You have regained your sense of vision.

deaf.activation_text: You have <s>lost your sense of hearing</s>.
deaf.deactivation_text: You have regained your sense of hearing.

anosmic.activation_text: You have <s>lost your sense of smell</s>.
anosmic.deactivation_text: You have regained your sense of smell.
